title: App Alert
text: Warning: There is a bug in this version of the application and our team is working quickly to resolve it.

title: Fixed App Crash
text: Info: There was a bug found in the app. This caused the app to crash when entering a hymn number into a new program that was not found in any of the loaded catalogs. Our team has found this bug and squashed it. Thank you for your patience and we apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you.
